HitTitle: Choose between two auction item descriptions
Answer 1: PUMA Watch (black) with changeable faces, new in box
Answer 2: "Like New" is a cliche`. New in the box is accurate and specific. Option A is FAR too wordy without any breakup of the content. My experience would tend to believe most readers would stop reading after about the second line. If I enjoy swimming is unnecessary, but Option B could have mentioned the waterproof component of the watch. Still for straight forward information that is easy to read and interesting, option B gets to the point. Sometimes in Internet advertising more is not always better.
